articles.title: WIDF Solidarity March Held
articles.content:
WIDF Solidarity March Held
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- A 2018 Women's International Democratic Federation solidarity march supporting the just cause of the Korean people and women took place here on Sunday.
					 There was a starting ceremony of the solidarity march in front of the Monument to the Three Charters for National Reunification.
					
					 Present there were Jang Chun Sil, chairwoman of the Central Committee of the Socialist Women's Union of Korea (SWUK), vice-chairpersons of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with the World People (KCSWP), officials of the SWUK Central Committee and women workers of different social strata.
					
					 Attending it were Lorena Pena, chairwoman of the WIDF, and members of its leadership, women delegations and delegates from different countries taking part in WIDF meetings.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The chairwoman and vice-chairwoman of the WIDF hailed the important decisions made at the Third Plenary Meeting of the Seventh Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, extending greetings to Chairman Kim Jong Un who set forth the new strategic line on channeling all efforts into the socialist economic construction and developing science and technology.
					
					 The energetic activities and efforts made by the DPRK, creating the atmosphere of detente and peace on the Korean peninsula and the region are supported and welcomed by the international community, they said.
					
					 The KCSWP vice-chairpersons called for strengthened solidarity among the world people aspiring after independence and justice and loving peace and expressed the will to fully discharge their international obligations in building a new world free from aggression, war, domination and plunder.
					
					 A solidarity statement of the WIDF supporting the just cause of the Korean people and women was made public.
					
					 The participants of the march started from the Monument to the Three Charters for National Reunification.
					
					 The crowd ardently welcomed the marchers positively conducting the righteous international solidarity activities.

articles.title: New Strategic Line Is Epitome of Faith and Will of Juche Korea
articles.content:
New Strategic Line Is Epitome of Faith and Will of Juche Korea
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The victory of the line on simultaneous development of the two fronts was declared and a new strategic line on channeling all efforts on the socialist economic construction was set forth at the historic April plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea in 2018.
					 This is a landmark of the revolution that indicates the path of independence, the path of victory of socialism consistently maintained by the DPRK, and it is an epitome of the faith and will of the heroic Korean people who will win the final victory under the guidance of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The WPK advanced the revolutionary strategic line on simultaneously developing the economic construction and the building of nuclear force, at the March plenary meeting in 2013 under the prevailing situation and prompted by the requirements of the developing revolution.
					
					 In the arduous course of the simultaneous development of the two fronts, the WPK covered the uninterrupted path, braving difficulties and trials with firm belief in the validity of its cause and with firm confidence in the people.
					
					 The tremendous might of the single-hearted unity of the entire party and all the people made the moves of the hostile forces for unprecedented sanctions aimed to stifle the DPRK end in a fiasco and brought miraculous victories, that others could hardly do even for scores of years, in a short span of less than five years, thereby turning our country into a world-level nuclear power and resulting in big strides in the economic construction.
					
					 Thanks to the great victory of the line on simultaneous development of the two fronts, the struggle of the Korean people was successfully concluded as a result of the hard work they made by tightening their belt to gain the powerful treasured sword for defending peace, and it has become possible to flutter the flag of victory on the important strategic height which should be attained on a priority basis in building a prosperous socialist country.
					
					 The new strategic line set forty by the WPK is another powerful treasured sword and a bright blueprint for opening up a higher historic phase of the revolution and accelerating its advance, and the DPRK has definitely entered the straight path for final victory at last.
					
					 The victory of the line on simultaneous development of the two fronts is another political event that opened up a special chapter in the struggle of the progressive mankind aspiring after independence as well as in the history of our country and its people.
					
					 The people of the DPRK, who climbed the high peak of victory after going through the arduous path of the simultaneous development of the two fronts in defiance of trials, are dashing toward the final victory of socialist construction with confidence and optimism about the rosier and brighter future lying before them.

articles.title: Memorandum of C.C., DFRK on Exploits of Peerlessly Great Men
articles.content:
Memorandum of C.C., DFRK on Exploits of Peerlessly Great Men
Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea made public a memorandum on the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who provided the tradition of great national unity in the first period of national division and successfully carried forward and developed it generation after generation. The memorandum was issued on Saturday to mark the 70th anniversary of the Joint Conference of Representatives of Political Parties and Social Organizations in North and South Korea.
					 The memorandum said it is the line of national reunification consistently maintained by Kim Il Sung since the first day of national division that Korea should not be bisected but reunified in line with the common will and demand of the nation.
					
					 It noted that Kim Il Sung made a proposal of convening a joint conference of representatives of political parties and public organizations in North and South Korea in his speech "On the Proposal for North-South Negotiations" made at a meeting of the corps of chairmen of the Central Committee of the Democratic National United Front of North Korea in October 1947 when the U.S. imperialists resorted to all sorts of vicious moves to hold "separate elections" and form a "separate government" under the signboard of the United Nations, and wisely led the struggle for realizing it.
					
					 Noting that the joint conference successfully took place in Pyongyang on April 19-23, 1948 with the attendance of 695 representatives of 56 political parties and public organizations in the north and the south of Korea, the memorandum stressed that the April joint conference was a brilliant fruition of Kim Il Sung's independent line of national reunification and idea of great national unity and the first historic victory won by the pro-reunification patriotic forces.
					
					 It referred to the fact that he had wisely led the struggle for achieving the great unity of the nation and reunifying the country on the basis of the experience and success made in the above-said joint conference.
					
					 It lauded leader Kim Jong Il as the eternal sun of the nation who defended and carried forward Kim Il Sung's idea of great national unity and exploits and thus developed the struggle for national unity and reunification onto a new higher level.
					
					 It said that Kim Jong Il energetically guided the work for building a revolutionary site and erecting the United Front Tower on Ssuk Islet where a consultative meeting was held with the south Korean representatives who participated in the joint conference. Under his energetic guidance, a monument to the autograph of Kim Il Sung was erected in Panmunjom, a symbol of division, as the icon of national reunification, to convey his exploits for national reunification and a monument to the Three Charters for National Reunification towered imposingly in Thongil Street of Pyongyang, it added.
					
					 The memorandum went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il made public a large number of works to comprehensively develop in depth Kim Il Sung's idea of great national unity and clearly show the most correct road of national unity and reunification to all compatriots.
					
					 He ushered in a new era of great national unity with his far-sighted plan of national reunification, broad magnanimity and warm fraternity.
					
					 The great leaders' idea of great national unity and exploits and their rich experience and tradition are now being successfully carried forward and developed by the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Jong Un developed in depth the great leaders' idea and line of great national unity to suit the new historical phase and has taken a series of epoch-making and realistic measures for carrying them into practice.
					
					 The situation on the Korean peninsula frozen due to antagonism and confrontation has now entered a phase of thaw thanks to Kim Jong Un's patriotic will and bold decision to make a great turn and change in the north-south relations through the great unity of the whole nation and open up a new phase of independent reunification.
					
					 Thanks to the outstanding and tested guidance of Kim Jong Un who has creditably inherited the great leaders' noble idea of great national unity, fine spring of sprouting and blooming and autumn of rich harvest only will await the Koreans aspiring after great national unity and reunification, the memorandum concluded.

articles.title: Foreigners Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Foreigners Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests including an Okayama prefectural Japan-Korea friendship delegation of Japan led by Seisuke Mihara, representative of the Association for Promotion of Friendship between Japan and North and South Korea, visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Sunday.
					 They paid tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 At the halls of immortality where the great leaders lie in state, they made bows to them.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the great leaders received are on display and halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them for field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Foreigners Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Foreigners Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Lorena Pena, chairwoman of the Women's International Democratic Federation, and women delegations and delegates from different countries taking part in WIDF meetings visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the noble life of Kim Il Sung and his patriotic and revolutionary Mangyongdae family members, the guests looked round the historical relics.
					
					 They also toured the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace, the Breast Tumour Institute of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital, the Okryu Children's Hospital, etc.

articles.title: WPK's Line of Simultaneously Developing Two Fronts Praised
articles.content:
WPK's Line of Simultaneously Developing Two Fronts Praised
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Upon receiving the news about the April 2018 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) in which the great victory of the WPK's line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of a nuclear force was declared, the whole country is seized with great joy.
					 In this regard, Dr. Kim In Chol of the Academy of Social Sciences told KCNA:
					
					 The miraculous victory of having perfectly accomplished the great historic cause of building the state nuclear force in a short span of less than five years is the great victory of the WPK's line of simultaneously developing the two fronts.
					
					 Everyone in the country offers the greatest honor and warmest thanks to the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who declared with pride that the historic tasks under the strategic line of simultaneously developing the two fronts set forth at the March 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the WPK were successfully carried out and put forward the new strategic line. 
					
					 Ri Un Chon, vice-minister of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry, said:
					
					 The great victory of simultaneously developing the two fronts enables us to concentrate our efforts on the economic building.
					
					 Through the victory of simultaneously developing the two fronts, we are confident of our brilliant victory in materializing the new strategic line.
					
					 We will launch a revolutionary general offensive and make a dynamic advance in the economic construction under the uplifted militant slogan "Let us further accelerate the advance of our revolution by concentrating all our efforts on socialist economic construction!"
					
					 As an official of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry, I will do my best to carry through the new strategic line.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lays Bare Goal of U.S. Ideological and Cultural Poisoning
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lays Bare Goal of U.S. Ideological and Cultural Poisoning
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The U.S. ideological and cultural poisoning is a vicious aggressive move to paralyze the sound ideological consciousness of the people and realize the regime change after all.
					 Rodong Sinmun says this in an article on Sunday, adding:
					
					 If one falls captive to the imperialist ideology and culture, one would be powerless though one has powerful military strength. This is a bitter lesson taught by history.
					
					 The reactionary ideological and cultural poisoning paved a way for aggression by the imperialists in the past, and it is now playing the leading role in aggression.
					
					 Any destroyed material wealth can be restored, but nothing can make up for the mental and moral ruin of human being or the ideological and cultural ruin of the nation.
					
					 The reactionary culture of the bourgeois is an ideological poisoning making the people morally degenerated but the socialist ideological culture an ideological and mental food totally favoring the independent requirements and creative activities of the popular masses.
					
					 The socialist ideological culture is a revolutionary ideology and culture that reflects the popular masses' beautiful dreams, ideal and noble and sound way of life and represents the justice and truth.
					
					 As long as there is the revolutionary socialist ideological culture correctly reflecting the independent requirements of the masses, the imperialists' reactionary ideological culture can never make infiltration.
					
					 To frustrate the imperialists' moves for ideological and cultural poisoning presents itself as an acute issue on which hinges the future of each country and nation.

articles.title: S. Korea: Removal of Traitor Syngman Rhee's Bust Urged
articles.content:
S. Korea: Removal of Traitor Syngman Rhee's Bust Urged
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The Taejon Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration and other civic and public organizations in south Korea held a press conference on April 19 in demand of the removal of the bust of traitor Syngman Rhee at Baejae University, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Tongil News.
					 They said that no matter what others may say, Syngman Rhee was a dictator and an intolerable traitor to the nation as he checked the accomplishment of the historic task, the liquidation of pro-Japanese remnants.
					
					 They urged the university side to remove the traitor's bust within a short period.

articles.title: S. Korea: Struggle for Probe into Case of Ferry Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korea: Struggle for Probe into Case of Ferry Disaster
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The April 16 Consultative Council of Families of Victims and other organizations in south Korea called a press conference on April 17 in demand of the resignation of those who hindered the probe into the truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Jaju Sibo.
					 They declared that those who stood against the probe into the case can never be pardoned.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on April 14.
					 The letter said that with deep gratitude and joy Chongryon received 213.74 million yen worth of educational aid fund and stipends sent by Kim Jong Un again ahead of the 106th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It noted that the peerlessly great men have so far sent the educational aid fund and stipends for the democratic national education of the children of Koreans in Japan in 164 installments, which amount to 48 219 730 390 yen in total.
					
					 The educational aid fund and stipends serve as a source of strength inspiringly encouraging the Chongryon officials and Koreans in Japan in the struggle to develop the movement of Koreans in Japan onto a higher stage with the 24th Chongryon Congress as an occasion true to the New Year congratulatory message sent by Kim Jong Un, and as a treasure sword and precious life-giving water for strengthening Chongryon's work of national education, the letter said.
					
					 It expressed the resolve to repay Kim Jong Un's repeated love and trust with big achievements in the work of Chongryon by brilliantly decorating this year when the 70th birthday of the DPRK is marked and the 24th Chongryon Congress is to be held.

articles.title: Meeting of Koreans in Japan Marks Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Meeting of Koreans in Japan Marks Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- A meeting of Koreans in Japan took place at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo on April 14 to celebrate the 106th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there were Chairman Ho Jong Man and vice-chairmen Nam Sung U and Pae Ik Ju of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), chairpersons of Chongryon headquarters in Kanto area, leading officials of Chongryon organizations and businesses and other Korean residents in Japan.
					
					 At the meeting Ho Jong Man said that the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un sent 213.74 million yen worth of educational aid fund and stipends ahead of the 106th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Ho made a report.
					
					 The reporter noted that officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan were celebrating the 106th birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung with meetings, seminars and colorful cultural and sports events in different parts of Japan.
					
					 He recalled the fact that the President presented the pleasure of national liberation to the Koreans in Japan, who were taken to Japan to go through exploitation and suppression, and took warm care of them as dignified overseas compatriots of new democratic Korea.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The Koreans in Japan can never forget the love and favors bestowed by Kim Il Sung who had shown warm care for Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The exploits performed by the President in leading Chongryon were carried forward by leader Kim Jong Il. And they are shining more brilliantly in the new century of Juche under the guidance of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 As long as there is Kim Jong Un, the eternal prosperity of socialist Korea is sure and the victory of Chongryon is definite along with the final victory of the cause of Juche.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was read out at the meeting.

articles.title: Lecture in Japan Marks Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Lecture in Japan Marks Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- A lecture meeting of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) was held at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on April 14 to celebrate the 106th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there were Chairman Ho Jong Man and vice-chairmen of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, the chairman of the Central Audit Committee of Chongryon, directors and advisers of Chongryon, the director of the Research Institute on History of Korean Residents in Japan, the honorary professor and the president of Korean University, senior officials of the central organizations and businesses of Chongryon, officials of Chongryon headquarters in Kanto area and other Koreans in Japan and students of Korean University.
					
					 The participants watched a video lecture "Immortal exploits shines along with the Joint Conference of Representatives of Political Parties and Public Organizations in North and South Korea in Pyongyang in April 1948".
					
					 The lecture showed through historic scenes the exploits of President Kim Il Sung who convened the April Joint Conference to cope with the scheme of the U.S. imperialists and the Syngman Rhee group of traitors to keep Korea divided into two parts forever and led the struggle to build an all-Korea unified government by the Korean people themselves.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Printed in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Printed in Russia
Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Live and Work in the Revolutionary Spirit of Paektu, the Spirit of the Blizzards of Paektu" was brought out in booklet by the Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia on April 4 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The work, published on Oct. 27, Juche 103 (2014), stresses that everyone should know Mt Paektu to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche. And it indicates the tasks for living and struggling in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of blizzards of Paektu.

articles.title: Congratulatory Visits to DPRK Missions Abroad
articles.content:
Congratulatory Visits to DPRK Missions Abroad
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Delegations of political parties and organizations and personages in different countries paid congratulatory visits to the DPRK missions between April 3 and 17 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They laid floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and art pieces depicting the peerlessly great men, and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The visitors included delegations of the People's Party of Cambodia, the Workers' Party of Mexico, the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, the Mexican Friend Association for Memory of President Kim Il Sung and Leader Kim Jong Il, the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Mexico-Korea Friendship Association, the Mexican Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, the Communist Party of the Democratic Congo and the Federation of Students and Pupils of DR Congo, a Nigerian political party delegation comprising figures of the Better Nigeria Progressive Party, the People's Democratic Party, the People's Progressive Party and other political parties, the director of the Political Bureau of the Cuban Ministry of Revolutionary Armed Forces who is member of the C.C., Communist Party, the secretary general of the Bangladesh Jatiya Party, the general secretary of the C.C., Socialist Party of Bangladesh, the chairman of the C.C., Bangladesh Communist Party, the president of
					
					  the Bangladesh People's League, the general secretary of the C.C., Workers’ Party of Bangladesh, the chairman of the Central Executive Committee of the Bangladesh National Socialist Party, the chairman of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea, the chairman of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, the former Nepali deputy prime minister who is general secretary of the C.C., Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), the chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics who is chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association, the chairman of the Study and Research Forum of Songun Politics of the National Press Club of Nepal, the chairman of the Study Forum for Self-Reliance of Nepal, the chairman of the Socialist Journalist Forum of Nepal for the Study of the Juche Idea, the vice-general secretary of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran and his party, the director of the International Department of the Iranian W
					
					 orkers' House and his party, members of the State Academic Igor Moiseyev Dance Company of Russia and the secretary general of the Romanian Workers' Association.
					
					 Meanwhile, the president of the Socialist Party of Benin and the chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea who is chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" sent bouquets to the DPRK mission on April 10 and 11.

articles.title: CC del FDRP recuerda hazanas de lideres coreanos realizadas en unidad nacional
articles.content:
CC del FDRP recuerda hazanas de lideres coreanos realizadas en unidad nacional
Pyongyang, 22 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del aniversario 70 de la Conferencia Conjunta de Abril de los Representantes de los Partidos Politicos y las Organizaciones Sociales del Norte y el Sur de Corea, el Comite Central del Frente Democratico para la Reunificacion de la Patria hizo publico el dia 21 un memorando para transmitir las hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung, quien preparo la tradicion de la gran unidad nacional en el primero periodo de la division nacional, y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un quienes desarrollaron de siglo en siglo esta tradicion.
					  El documento senala en particular:
					
					Nuestro pais no debe ser dividido en dos y debe reunificar sin falta segun la voluntad y la demanda comunes de la nacion, lo que es la linea de la reunificacion de la patria mantenida por el Presidente desde el primer dia de la division de Corea.
					
					  Inmediatamente despues de la liberacion de Corea (1945), en octubre del 36 (1947) de la Era Juche cuando el imperialismo norteamericano trataba de fabricar un "gobierno aparte mediante elecciones separadas" bajo el rotulo de la ONU, el Presidente presento la propuesta de convocar la Conferencia Conjunta Norte-Sur de Corea en su discurso "Sobre el proyecto de negociaciones Norte-Sur de Corea" pronunciado en la reunion de presidencia del Comite Central del Frente Unido Nacional Democratico de Corea del Norte y se esforzaba por realizarla.
					
					  Gracias a su sabia direccion, tuvo ligar en Pyongyang del dia 19 al 23 de abril de 1948 la Conferencia Conjunta de los Representantes de los Partidos Politicos y las Organizaciones Sociales del Norte y el Sur de Corea con la participacion de los 695 representantes de los 56 partidos politicos y entidades sociales del Norte y el Sur de Corea y esta conferencia fue el fruto brillante de la linea independiente de la reunificacion de la patria y la idea de la gran unidad de la nacion del Presidente y la primera victoria historica lograda por las fuerzas patrioticas de la reunificacion.
					
					  A base de las experiencias y exitos de esta reunion, el Presidente dirigio sabiamente la lucha por lograr la gran unidad de la nacion y la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					  El Dirigente es eterno sol de la nacion que dinamizo la lucha para la unidad nacional y la reintegracion de Corea al defender y continuar la idea del Presidente en materia de la gran unidad de la nacion y sus hazanas.
					
					  Hizo construir el lugar de interes historico-revolucionario en el islote Suk donde se efectuo la citada conferencia y erguir el Monumental al Frente Unido. Gracias a su incansable orientacion, se levanto en Phanmunjom, simbolo de division, la lapida con firma del Presidente que trasmite sus hazanas realizadas en la reunificacion de la patria y en la capitalina avenida Thong-il el Monumento a las Tres Cartas para la Reunificacion de la Patria. 
					
					  El Dirigente publico muchas obras para profundizar y desarrollar globalmente la idea del Presidente sobre la gran unidad de la nacion e iluminar el camino mas correcto de la unidad y la reunificacion de la nacion.
					
					  Con el ambicioso proyecto de la reunificacion de la patria, la magnanimidad y la fraternidad, el Dirigente abrio la nueva epoca de la gran unidad nacional.
					
					  Hoy dia, el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un lleva adelante la idea y las hazanas de los lideres antecedentes y las ricas experiencias y las tradiciones de la gran unidad de la nacion.
					
					  El Maximo Dirigente profundizo y desarrollo la idea y linea de la gran unidad nacional presentadas por los grandes lideres conforme a la nueva etapa historica y tomo las medidas trascendentales y realistas para realizarlas.
					
					  Gracias al proposito patriotico y la gran decision del Maximo Dirigente quien trata de registrar gran viraje en las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas mediante la gran unidad pannacional y abrir nueva fase de la reunificacion independiente, esta deshelandose la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Gracias a la direccion destacada y probada del Maximo Dirigente quien continua de modo brillante la idea de los lideres antecedentes en aras de la gran unidad nacional, los coreanos lograran sin falta su unidad y la reintegracion territorial.
